title: Is it mandatory to pray Isha with the imam to get the reward for the entire night in Ramadan?
transcript: dudas Yunus says is it mandatory in order for you to get reward whole night praying behind the mm to also Prayer Asia the answer is no if you pray the Asia in another message it and went and started Televi in another message with an imam this gives you the reward fully if you pray at home Asia and you want to the message and prayed from taraweeh first racket in the end this gives you the word bearing in mind that praying Asia in congregation is much more rewarding and beloved to Allah then praying the whole of taraweeh hunt the hatchet because this is voluntary and this is an obligation
